Houston,

Sorry for the delay in replying - I have been tied up with preparing 
for program reviews for other projects.

Thanks for your comments about Cantera. I'm glad you think it will be 
useful. I don't know much about Delphi, but from what you say it 
sounds like I should learn more. The graphical flame 'wrapper' you 
wrote sounds very interesting - when you have it ready, I'd like to 
see it.

Setting up the counterflow flame problem is easy. It is already there 
in C++, but I need to finish up the Python interface for it. Once I 
get past this week's program review (fortunately the last one), I'll 
have some time to work on Cantera again and will write the Python 
interface for counterflow flames.

Dave
